shortDescription: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) was discovered in 'Magmi 0.7.22'. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient filtration of user-supplied data (prefix) passed to the 'magmi-git-master/magmi/web/ajax_gettime.php' URL. An attacker could execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a browser in the context of the vulnerable website.
vulnerabilityName: magmi_project magmi Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
